anya-e1001n:13_0: Āyubbedo manubbedo, gandhabbo ceti te tayo;
anya-e1001n:16_0: Gandhabbā gaṇikā ceva, dhanubbedā ca pūraṇā.
anya-e1001n:17_0: Tikicchā itihāso ca, jotimāyā ca chandati;
anya-e1001n:18_0: Ketumantā ca saddā ca, sippāṭṭhārasakā ime.
anya-e1001n:21_0: Daṇḍena nīyate cedaṃ, daṇḍaṃ nayati vā puna;
anya-e1001n:32_0: Paṇḍito sujano kaṇḍo, dujjano mittaitthī ca;
anya-e1001n:43_0: (1) Paṇḍitakathā. (2) Sambhedakathā. (3) Mittakathā. (4) Nāyaka kathā. (5) Itthikathā
anya-e1001n:45_0: Muttaṃ muttaṃ sudassanaṃ, vande bodhivaraṃ varaṃ.
anya-e1001n:46_0: Nītidha jantūnaṃ sāro, mittācariyā ca pitaro;
anya-e1001n:49_0: (1) Ācariyakathā (2) sippakathā (3) paññākathā (4) sutakathā (5) kathānakathā (6) dhanakathā (7) desakathā
anya-e1001n:49_1: (8) nissayakathā (9) mittakathā (10) dujjanakathā (11) sujanakathā (12) balakathā (13) itthikathā (14)
anya-e1001n:49_2: yuttakathā (15) dāsakathā (16) gharāvāsakathā (17) kātabbakathā (18) akātabbakathā (19) ñātabbakathā
anya-e1001n:51_0: Brahmāti brahmabrahmindo, jino pūretu me bhāvaṃ.
anya-e1001n:54_0: Vanditvā ratanaṃ seṭṭhaṃ, nissāya pubbake garu;
anya-e1001n:57_0: Desañca nissayo mittaṃ, dujjano sujano balaṃ.
anya-e1001n:58_0: Itthī putto ca dāso ca, gharāvāso katākato;
anya-e1001n:62_0: Sīhā ekaṃ bakā ekaṃ, sikkhe cattāri kukkuṭā;
anya-e1001n:63_0: Pañca kākā rājā nāma, cha sunakkhā tīṇi gadrabhā.
anya-e1001n:65_0: Mahākammaṃ khuddakaṃ vā, yaṃ kammaṃ kātumicchati;
anya-e1001n:66_0: Sabbārambhena kātabbaṃ, sīhā ekaṃ tadā bhave.
anya-e1001n:72_0: Thiyā akkamma bhuttañca, sikkhe cattāri kukkuṭo.
anya-e1001n:78_0: Daḷhabhatti ca sūrañca, cha etesvānato guṇo.
anya-e1001n:80_0: Khinnova vahate bhāraṃ, sītuṇhañca na cintayī;
anya-e1001n:81_0: Santuṭṭho ca bhave niccaṃ, tīṇi sikkheyya gadrabhā.
anya-e1001n:83_0: Vīsati tāni guṇāni, careyya iha paṇḍito;
anya-e1001n:84_0: Vijeyya ripū sabbepi, tejassī so bhavissati.
anya-e1001n:85_0: (1) Paṇḍitakaṇḍa (2) sujanakaṇḍa (3) bāladujjanakaṇḍa (4) mittakaṇḍa (5) rājakaṇḍa (6) nāyakakaṇḍa (7)
anya-e1001n:99_0: Nīti sāro manussānaṃ, mitto ācariyopi ca;
anya-e1001n:100_0: Mātā pitā ca nītimā, sutavā ganthakārako.
anya-e1001n:102_0: Alasassa kuto sippaṃ, asippassa kuto dhanaṃ;
anya-e1001n:103_0: Adhanassa kuto mittaṃ, amittassa kuto sukhaṃ;
anya-e1001n:104_0: Asukhassa kuto puññaṃ, apuññassa kuto varaṃ.
anya-e1001n:118_0: Sippasamaṃ dhanaṃ natthi, sippaṃ corā na gaṇhare;
anya-e1001n:119_0: Idha loke sippaṃ mittaṃ, paraloke sukhāvahaṃ.
anya-e1001n:121_0: Bhuñjanatthaṃ kathanatthaṃ, mukhaṃ hotīti no vade;
anya-e1001n:122_0: Yaṃ vātaṃ vā mukhāruḷhaṃ, vacanaṃ paṇḍito naro.
anya-e1001n:124_0: Dummedhehi pasaṃsā ca, viññūhi garahā ca yā;
anya-e1001n:128_0: Upadesaṃ sadā gaṇhe, garuṃ sammā upaṭṭhahaṃ.
anya-e1001n:130_0: Upadesaṃ sadā gaṇhe, garuṃ sammā upaṭṭhahaṃ.
anya-e1001n:144_0: Paṇḍite ca guṇā sabbe, mūḷhe dosā hi kevalaṃ;
anya-e1001n:152_0: Dhanañca naṃ alābhesi, tena cattamano ahu.
anya-e1001n:154_0: Vijjā dadāti vinayaṃ, vinayā yāti pattataṃ;
anya-e1001n:155_0: Pattattā dhanaṃ pappoti, dhanā dhammaṃ tato sukhaṃ.
anya-e1001n:158_0: Diṭṭheva dhamme pāsaṃsā, samparāye ca suggatiṃ.
anya-e1001n:161_0: Attanīva sabbabhūtesu, yo passati so paṇḍito.
anya-e1001n:166_0: Passāmi vohaṃ attānaṃ, yathā icchiṃ tathā ahu.
anya-e1001n:174_0: Kiṃ kulena visālena, guṇahīno tu yo naro;
anya-e1001n:178_0: Piyañca annapānamhi, atthe jāte ca paṇḍitaṃ.
anya-e1001n:181_0: Vijjāhīnā na sobhante, niggandhā iva kiṃ sukā.
anya-e1001n:184_0: Sūrappabhāya ādāso, chāyaṃ disse na mākare.
anya-e1001n:192_0: Mahātejopi tejoyaṃ, mattikaṃ na muduṃ kare;
anya-e1001n:195_0: Kottho puttena jātena, yo na vidū na dhammiko;
anya-e1001n:196_0: Kāṇena cakkhunā kiṃ vā, cakkhu pīḷeva kevalaṃ.
anya-e1001n:198_0: Mudunāva ripuṃ jeti, mudunā jeti dāruṇaṃ;
anya-e1001n:199_0: No na siddhaṃ mudu kiñci, tato ca mudunā jaye.
anya-e1001n:201_0: Sajāto yena jātena, yāti vaṃso samunnatiṃ;
anya-e1001n:202_0: Parivattinisaṃsāre, mato ko vā na jāyate.
anya-e1001n:204_0: Dāne tapasi sūre ca, yassa na patthito yaso;
anya-e1001n:207_0: Varo eko guṇī putto, na ca mūḷhasatānyapi;
anya-e1001n:208_0: Eko cando tamo hanati, na ca tārāgaṇo tathā.
anya-e1001n:211_0: Tassa putto bhave vasso, samiddho dhammiko suddhe.
anya-e1001n:214_0: Pattetu soḷase vasse, puttaṃ mittaṃva ācare.
anya-e1001n:216_0: Lālane bahavo dosā, tālane bahavo guṇā;
anya-e1001n:217_0: Tasmā puttañca sissañca, tālaye na tu lālaye.
anya-e1001n:220_0: Etesu kovido pañño, dhīro pāḷiṃ visodhaye.
anya-e1001n:225_0: Candanaṃ sītalaṃ loke, candikā sītalā tato;
anya-e1001n:243_0: Satesu jāyate sūro, sahassesu ca paṇḍito;
anya-e1001n:244_0: Vuttā satasahassesu, dātā bhavati vā na vā.
anya-e1001n:247_0: Sadese pūjito rājā, vidvā sabbattha pūjito.
anya-e1001n:250_0: Asataṃ pana sabbesaṃ, dukkhahetu na saṃsayo.
anya-e1001n:252_0: Paṇḍite sujane sante, sabbepi sujanā janā;
anya-e1001n:256_0: Vinītaṃ yanti sabbepi, ko taṃ nāseyya paṇḍito.
anya-e1001n:261_0: Ambuṃ pivanti no najjo, rukkho khādati no phalaṃ;
anya-e1001n:262_0: Megho kvacipi no sassaṃ, paratthāya sataṃ dhanaṃ.
anya-e1001n:267_0: Sataṃ pharusavācāhi, na yāti vikatiṃ mano;
anya-e1001n:268_0: Tiṇukkāhi na sakkāva, tāpetuṃ sāgare jalaṃ.
anya-e1001n:270_0: Selo yathā ekaghano, vātena na samīrati;
anya-e1001n:277_0: Anuyyogena telāni, tilehi na sakkā laddhuṃ.
anya-e1001n:279_0: Yathā hyekena cakkena, na rathassa pati bhave;
anya-e1001n:280_0: Evaṃ purisakārena, vinā kammaṃ na sijjhati.
anya-e1001n:282_0: Uyyāmena hi sijjhanti, kāriyāni na manorathaṃ;
anya-e1001n:283_0: Na hi suttassa sīhassa, pavisanti migāmukhe.
anya-e1001n:288_0: Mātā sattu pitā verī, yena bālo na pāṭhito;
anya-e1001n:289_0: Na sobhate sabhāmajjhe, haṃsamajjhe bako yathā.
anya-e1001n:301_0: Byasanena ca mūḷhānaṃ, nidāya kalahena vā.
anya-e1001n:305_0: Niddāsīlī sabhāsīlī, anuṭṭhātā ca yo naro;
anya-e1001n:309_0: Na hi saṃharate jutiṃ, cando caṇḍālavesme.
anya-e1001n:311_0: Yatra vidvajjano natthi, sīlāghyo tatra appadhipi;
anya-e1001n:314_0: Ṭhānabhaṭṭhā na sobhante, dantā kesā nakhā narā;
anya-e1001n:325_0: Tādisaṃ bhajamānassa, seyyo hoti na pāpiyo.
anya-e1001n:328_0: Khippaṃ dhammaṃ vijānāti, jivhā sūparasaṃ yathā.
anya-e1001n:330_0: Dullabho purisājañño, na so sabbattha jāyati;
anya-e1001n:331_0: Yattha so jāyatī dhīro, taṃ kulaṃ sukha medhati.
anya-e1001n:337_0: Bhattaṃ ukkhaliyaṃ pakkaṃ, bhājanepi tathā bhave.
anya-e1001n:345_0: Sele sele na maṇikaṃ, gaje gaje na muttikaṃ;
anya-e1001n:346_0: Vane vane na candanaṃ, ṭhāne ṭhāne na paṇḍito.
anya-e1001n:348_0: Paṇḍito sutasampanno, yattha atthīti ce suto;
anya-e1001n:351_0: Potthakesu ca yaṃ sippaṃ, parahatthesu yaṃ dhanaṃ;
anya-e1001n:352_0: Yathākicce samuppanne, na taṃ sippaṃ na taṃ dhanaṃ.
anya-e1001n:354_0: Uppalena jalaṃ jaññā, kiriyāya kulaṃ naro;
anya-e1001n:361_0: Appassuto sutaṃ appaṃ, bahuṃ maññati mānavā;
anya-e1001n:364_0: Paṭhame sippaṃ gaṇheyya, eseyya dutiye dhanaṃ;
anya-e1001n:365_0: Careyya tatiye dhammaṃ, esā janāna dhammatā.
anya-e1001n:368_0: Paññāya atthaṃ jānāti, attho ñāto sukhāvaho.
anya-e1001n:370_0: Natthi vijjāsamaṃ mittaṃ, na ca byādhisamo ripu;
anya-e1001n:371_0: Na ca atthasamaṃ pemaṃ, na ca kammasamaṃ balaṃ.
anya-e1001n:373_0: Vinā satthaṃ na gaccheyya, sūro saṅgāmabhūmiyaṃ;
anya-e1001n:382_0: Haṃso majjhe na kākānaṃ, sīho gunnaṃ na sobhate;
anya-e1001n:386_0: Attānurūpakaṃ kodhaṃ, yo jānāti sa paṇḍito.
anya-e1001n:389_0: Appapūro ghaṭo khobhe, appakhīrā gāvī cale.
anya-e1001n:391_0: Na titti rājā dhanamhi, paṇḍitopi subhāsite;
anya-e1001n:392_0: Cakkhupi piyadassane, na titti sāgaro jale.
anya-e1001n:397_0: Yo sisso sippalobhena, bahuṃ gaṇhāti taṃ sippaṃ;
anya-e1001n:398_0: Mūgova supinaṃ passaṃ, kathetumpi na ussahe.
anya-e1001n:400_0: Na bhijjetuṃ kumbhakāro, sobhetuṃ kumbha ghaṭati;
anya-e1001n:407_0: Vāsitaṃ kānanaṃ sabbaṃ, suputtena kulaṃ yathā.
anya-e1001n:409_0: Iṇakattā pitā sattu, mātā ca byabhicārinī;
anya-e1001n:410_0: Bhariyā rūpavatī sattu, putto sattu apaṇḍito.
anya-e1001n:423_0: Paccuppannañca yo dhammaṃ, tattha tattha vipassati;
anya-e1001n:426_0: Chandā dosā bhayā mohā, yo dhammaṃ nātivattati;
anya-e1001n:432_0: Dullabhaṃ pākatikaṃ vākyaṃ, dullabho khemakaro suto;
anya-e1001n:433_0: Dullabhā sadisī jāyā, dullabho sajano piyo.
anya-e1001n:441_0: Apuṭṭho paṇḍito bherī, pajjunno hoti pucchito;
anya-e1001n:442_0: Bālo puṭṭho apuṭṭho ca, bahuṃ vikatthate sadā.
anya-e1001n:446_0: Cakkhumāssa yathā andho, sotavā badhiro yathā;
anya-e1001n:451_0: Ovāde cassa tiṭṭheyya, patthento acalaṃ sukhaṃ.
anya-e1001n:456_0: Yo ca sītañca uṇhañca, tiṇābhiyyo na maññati;
anya-e1001n:457_0: Karaṃ purisakiccāni, so sukhaṃ na vihāyati.
anya-e1001n:459_0: Yasmiṃdese na sammāno, na piyo na ca bandhavo;
anya-e1001n:460_0: Na ca vijjāgamo koci, na tattha divasaṃ vase.
anya-e1001n:462_0: Dhanavā sutavā rājā, nadī vajjo ime pañca;
anya-e1001n:463_0: Yattha dese na vijjanti, na tattha divasaṃ vase.
anya-e1001n:465_0: Nabhassa bhūsanaṃ cando, nārīnaṃ bhūsanaṃ pati;
anya-e1001n:466_0: Chamāya bhūsanaṃ rājā, vijjā sabbassa bhūsanaṃ.
anya-e1001n:468_0: Sukhatthiko sace vijjaṃ, vijjatthiko caje sukhaṃ;
anya-e1001n:469_0: Sukhatthino kuto vijjā, kuto vijjatthino sukhaṃ.
anya-e1001n:472_0: Khaṇacāge kuto vijjā, kaṇacāge kato dhanaṃ.
anya-e1001n:477_0: Dhammo jaye no adhammo, saccaṃ jayati nāsaccaṃ;
anya-e1001n:478_0: Khamā jayati no kodho, devo jayati nāsūro.
anya-e1001n:480_0: Hatthassa bhūsanaṃ dānaṃ, saccaṃ kaṇṭhassa bhūsanaṃ;
anya-e1001n:481_0: Sotassa bhūsanaṃ satthaṃ, bhūsane kiṃ payojanaṃ.
anya-e1001n:483_0: Videsetu dhanaṃ vijjā, byasanesu dhanaṃ mati;
anya-e1001n:484_0: Paraloke dhanaṃ dhammo, sīlaṃ sabbattha ve dhanaṃ.
anya-e1001n:486_0: Padose dīpako cando, pabhāte dīpako ravi;
anya-e1001n:490_0: Na hi vañjhā vijānāti, guruṃ pasavavedanaṃ.
anya-e1001n:492_0: Yassa natthi sayaṃ paññā, satthaṃ tassa karoti kiṃ;
anya-e1001n:495_0: Kiṃ karissanti vattāro, sotaṃ yattha na vijjate;
anya-e1001n:501_0: Natthi attasamaṃ pemaṃ, natthi dhaññasamaṃ dhanaṃ;
anya-e1001n:502_0: Natthi paññāsamā ābhā, vuṭṭhi ve paramā sarā.
anya-e1001n:507_0: Tasmā hi paṇḍito poso, sampassaṃ atthamattano;
anya-e1001n:508_0: Buddhe dhamme ca saṅghe ca, dhīro saddhaṃ nivesaye.
anya-e1001n:510_0: Guṇo seṭṭhaṅgataṃ yāti, na ucce sayane vase;
anya-e1001n:511_0: Pāsādasikhare vāso, kāko kiṃ garuḷo siyā.
anya-e1001n:514_0: Āgatañca bhayaṃ disvā, abhīto hoti paṇḍito.
anya-e1001n:517_0: Malaṃ vaṇṇassa kosajjaṃ, pamādo rakkhato malaṃ.
anya-e1001n:519_0: Anupubbena medhāvī, thokaṃ thokaṃ khaṇe khaṇe;
anya-e1001n:522_0: Yañhi kayirā tañhi vade, yaṃ na kayirā na taṃ vade;
anya-e1001n:526_0: Pantho ca saṅgāmo titthaṃ, aṭṭhete parivajjiyā.
anya-e1001n:528_0: Rattoduṭṭho ca muḷho ca, mānī luddho tathālaso;
anya-e1001n:529_0: Ekacintī ca bālo ca, ete atthavināsakā.
anya-e1001n:531_0: Ratto duṭṭho ca mūḷho ca, bhīru āmisagaruko;
anya-e1001n:532_0: Itthī soṇḍo paṇḍako ca, navamo dārakopi ca.
anya-e1001n:534_0: Navate puggalā loke, ittarā calitā calā;
anya-e1001n:535_0: Etehi mantitaṃ guyhaṃ, khippaṃ bhavati pākaṭaṃ.
anya-e1001n:537_0: Yo niruttiṃ na sikkheyya, sikkhanto piṭakattayaṃ;
anya-e1001n:538_0: Pade pade vikaṅkheyya, vane andhagajo yathā.
anya-e1001n:552_0: Nāgo gato naramukhe na jahāti līḷaṃ;
anya-e1001n:557_0: Āhāre byavahāre ca, cattalajjo sadā bhave.
anya-e1001n:562_0: Jaheyya pāpake mitte, bhajeyya paṇḍite jane;
anya-e1001n:566_0: Yādisaṃ vappate bījaṃ, tādisaṃ harate phalaṃ.
anya-e1001n:568_0: Chando nidānaṃ gāthānaṃ, akkharā tāsaṃ viyañjanaṃ;
anya-e1001n:571_0: Tasmā hi paṇḍito poso, sampassaṃ hitamattano;
anya-e1001n:574_0: Dhīraṃ passe suṇe dhīraṃ, dhīrena sahasaṃvase;
anya-e1001n:577_0: Nayaṃ nayati medhāvī, adhurāyaṃ na yuñjati;
anya-e1001n:578_0: Sunayo seyyaso hoti, sammā vutto na kuppati;
anya-e1001n:579_0: Vinayaṃ so pajānāti, sādhu tena samāgamo.
anya-e1001n:595_0: Tathā sakalavijjānaṃ, dhammassa ca dhanassa ca.
anya-e1001n:597_0: Paṇḍitā dukkhaṃ patvāna, na bhavanti visādino;
anya-e1001n:598_0: Pavissa rāhuno mukhaṃ, kiṃ no deti puna sasī.
anya-e1001n:600_0: Javena assaṃ jānanti, vāhena ca balibaddhaṃ;
anya-e1001n:603_0: Manasā cintitaṃ kammaṃ, vacasā na pakāsaye;
anya-e1001n:606_0: Anabhyāse visaṃ vijjā, ajiṇṇe bhojanaṃ visaṃ;
anya-e1001n:607_0: Visaṃ sabhā daliddassa, vuddhassa taruṇī visaṃ.
anya-e1001n:608_0: Cattāro pañca ālope, ābhutvā udakaṃ pive;
anya-e1001n:611_0: Yassa eso pasutopi, guṇavā pujjate naro;
anya-e1001n:621_0: Na vade dakādī natthīti, mukhe ca vacanaṃ tathā.
anya-e1001n:623_0: Sabbaṃ suṇāti sotena, sabbaṃ passati cakkhunā;
anya-e1001n:624_0: Na ca diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ dhīro, sabbaṃ uccitu marahati.
anya-e1001n:629_0: Tasmā hi paṇḍito poso, sampassaṃ attamattano;
anya-e1001n:630_0: Yoniso vicine dhammaṃ, evaṃ tattha visujjhati.
anya-e1001n:633_0: Ārohati na yo saka-vaṃsaagge dhajo yathā.
anya-e1001n:641_0: Narattaṃ dullabhaṃ loke, vijjā tatra sudullabhā;
anya-e1001n:642_0: Kavittaṃ dullabhaṃ tatra, satti tatra sudullabhā.
anya-e1001n:651_0: Sutadhanañca cāgo ca, paññā ve sattamaṃ dhanaṃ.
anya-e1001n:652_0: Yassa ete dhanā atthi, itthiyā purisassa vā;
anya-e1001n:653_0: Adaliddoti taṃ āhu, amoghaṃ tassa jīvitaṃ.
anya-e1001n:658_0: Sataṃ saddhammamaññāya, seyyo hoti na pāpiyo.
anya-e1001n:678_0: Sītalaṃ yadi naraggi, pabbatagge ca uppalaṃ;
anya-e1001n:693_0: Sunakho sunakhaṃ disvā, dantaṃ dasseti hiṃsituṃ;
anya-e1001n:696_0: Na ca vegena kiccāni, kattabbāni kudācanaṃ;
anya-e1001n:708_0: Satañhi so piyo hoti, asataṃ hotiappiyo.
anya-e1001n:713_0: Na visaṃ visamiccāha, dhanaṃ saṅghassa uccate;
anya-e1001n:714_0: Visaṃ ekaṃva hanati, hanati saṅghassa sabbaṃ.
anya-e1001n:717_0: Bahuṃapi asādhūnaṃ, na ca vāriva aṇṇave.
anya-e1001n:719_0: Apattheyyaṃ na pattheyya, acinteyyaṃ na cintaye;
anya-e1001n:720_0: Dhammameva sucinteyya, kālaṃ moghaṃ na icchaye.
anya-e1001n:723_0: Na hi cintāmayā bhogā, itthiyā purisassa vā.
anya-e1001n:725_0: Asantassa piyo hoti, sante na kurute piyaṃ;
anya-e1001n:726_0: Asataṃ dhammaṃ roceti, taṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ.
anya-e1001n:728_0: Guṇā kubbanti dūtattaṃ, dūrepi vasataṃ sataṃ;
anya-e1001n:729_0: Ketake gandhaṃ ghāyitvā, gacchanti bhamarā sayaṃ.
anya-e1001n:742_0: Sabbe tasanti daṇḍassa, sabbe bhāyanti maccuno;
anya-e1001n:743_0: Attānaṃ upamaṃ katvā, na haneyya na ghātaye.
anya-e1001n:745_0: Bālo vā yadi vā vuddho, yuvā vā gehamāgato;
anya-e1001n:758_0: Atipiyo na kātabbo, khalo kotuhalaṃ karo;
anya-e1001n:761_0: Sappo duṭṭho khalo duṭṭho, sappā duṭṭhataro khalo;
anya-e1001n:764_0: Yo bālo maññati bālyaṃ, paṇḍito vāpi tenaso;
anya-e1001n:765_0: Bālo ca paṇḍitamānī, sa ve bāloti vuccati.
anya-e1001n:767_0: Madhūva maññati bālo, yāva pāpaṃ na paccati;
anya-e1001n:768_0: Yadā ca paccati pāpaṃ, atha dukkhaṃ nigacchati.
anya-e1001n:770_0: Na sādhu balavā bālo, sāhasā vindate dhanaṃ;
anya-e1001n:773_0: Ghare duṭṭho mūsiko ca, vane duṭṭho ca vānaro;
anya-e1001n:774_0: Sakuṇe ca duṭṭho kāko, nareduṭṭho ca brāhmaṇo.
anya-e1001n:776_0: Dīghā jāgarato ratti, dīghaṃ santassa yojanaṃ;
anya-e1001n:782_0: Nattadosaṃ pare jaññā, jaññā dosaṃ parassatu;
anya-e1001n:788_0: Yathā udumbarapakkā, bahi rattakā eva ca;
anya-e1001n:792_0: Na so dhammaṃ vijānāti, dabbī sūparasaṃ yathā.
anya-e1001n:795_0: Ekacariyaṃ daḷhaṃ kayirā, natthi bāle sahāyatā.
anya-e1001n:800_0: Dujjanena samaṃ veraṃ, sakhyañcāpi na kāraye;
anya-e1001n:801_0: Uṇho dahati caṅgāro, sīto kaṇhāyate karaṃ.
anya-e1001n:804_0: Madhu tiṭṭhati jivhagge, hadaye halāhalaṃ visaṃ.
anya-e1001n:807_0: Maṇinā bhūsito sappo, kimeso na bhayaṅkaro.
anya-e1001n:812_0: Yathāpi pana sapakkā, bahi kaṇṭakameva ca;
anya-e1001n:821_0: Upadeso hi mūḷhānaṃ, pakopāya na santiyā.
anya-e1001n:823_0: Na ṭhātabbaṃ na gantabbaṃ, dujjanena samaṃ kvaci;
anya-e1001n:824_0: Dujjano hi dukkhaṃ deti, na so sukhaṃ kadācipi.
anya-e1001n:826_0: Abaddhā tattha bajjhanti, yattha bālā pabhāsare;
anya-e1001n:827_0: Baddhāpi tattha muccanti, yattha dhīrā pabhāsare.
anya-e1001n:839_0: Hitakkaro paro bandhu, bandhupi ahito paro;
anya-e1001n:852_0: Rājadvāre susāne ca, yo tiṭṭhati so bandhavā.
anya-e1001n:854_0: Na 2 vissase amittassa, mittañcāpi na vissase;
anya-e1001n:857_0: Mātā mittaṃ pitā ceti, sabhāvā taṃ tayaṃ hitaṃ;
anya-e1001n:860_0: Āpadāsu mittaṃ jaññā, yuddhe sūraṃ iṇe suciṃ;
anya-e1001n:861_0: Bhariyaṃ khīṇesu vittesu, byasanesu ca bandhavaṃ.
anya-e1001n:863_0: Sakiṃ duṭṭhañca yo mittaṃ, puna sandhātumicchati;
anya-e1001n:867_0: Punappunaṃ vivaḍḍhanti, tasmā sesaṃ na kāraye.
anya-e1001n:870_0: Tādisaṃ no paseveyya, hadaye tu halāhalaṃ.
anya-e1001n:872_0: Na seve pharusaṃ sāmiṃ, na ca seveyya macchariṃ;
anya-e1001n:873_0: Tato apaggaṇha sāmiṃ, neva niggahitaṃ tato.
anya-e1001n:881_0: Ahitā paṭisedho ca, hitesu ca payojanaṃ;
anya-e1001n:884_0: Piyo garu bhāvanīyo, vattā ca vacanakkhamo;
anya-e1001n:885_0: Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojako;
anya-e1001n:887_0: Piyo garu bhāva nīyo, vattā ca vacanakkhamo;
anya-e1001n:888_0: Gambhirañca kathaṃ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojako.
anya-e1001n:896_0: Piyo garu bhāvaniyo, vattā ca vacanakkhamo;
anya-e1001n:897_0: Gambhirañca kathaṃ kattā, na caṭṭhāne niyojako;
anya-e1001n:899_0: Piyo garu bhāvanīyo, vattā ca vacanakkhamo;
anya-e1001n:900_0: Gambhirañca kathaṃ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojako;
anya-e1001n:904_0: Mahājanaṃ yo rañjeti, catūhipi vatthūhi vā;
anya-e1001n:905_0: Rājāti vuccate loke, iti sallakkhaye vidvā.
anya-e1001n:910_0: Kariyacariyasusaṅgahaṃ bahūnaṃ, anavamatena guṇena yāti saggaṃ;
anya-e1001n:911_0: Dānañca peyyavajjañca, atthacariyā ca yā idha;
anya-e1001n:912_0: Samānattatā ca dhammesu, tattha tattha yathārahaṃ;
anya-e1001n:913_0: Ete kho saṅgahā loke, rathassāṇīva yāyato.
anya-e1001n:915_0: Dānaṃ sīlaṃ pariccāgaṃ, ajjavaṃ maddavaṃ tapaṃ;
anya-e1001n:919_0: Ekayāmaṃ saye rājā, dviyā maññeva paṇḍito;
anya-e1001n:922_0: Aputtakaṃ gharaṃ suññaṃ, raṭṭhaṃ suññaṃ arājakaṃ;
anya-e1001n:929_0: Dubbalassa balaṃ rājā, kumārānaṃ rudaṃ balaṃ.
anya-e1001n:932_0: Nāyakassa guṇā ete, icchitabbā sataṃ sadā.
anya-e1001n:935_0: Sakiṃ sappurisā loke, esa dhammo sanantano.
anya-e1001n:940_0: Yo paṇḍito kodhano taṃ na sādhu.
anya-e1001n:942_0: Āyaṃ khayaṃ sayaṃ jaññā, katākataṃ sayaṃ jaññā;
anya-e1001n:945_0: Mātā puttakataṃ pāpaṃ, sissakataṃ guru tathā;
anya-e1001n:948_0: Akkodhena jine kodhaṃ, asādhuṃ sādhunā jine;
anya-e1001n:959_0: Na raññā samakaṃ bhuñje, kāmabhogaṃ kudācanaṃ;
anya-e1001n:963_0: Na me rājā sakhā hoti, na rājā hoti samako;
anya-e1001n:964_0: Eso sāmiko mayhanti, citte niṭṭhaṃ saṇṭhāpaye.
anya-e1001n:967_0: Ujuke nātininne ca, na bhaje uccamāsane;
anya-e1001n:968_0: Cha dose vajje sevako, aggīva saṃyato tiṭṭhe.
anya-e1001n:969_0: Na pacchato na purato, nāpi āsannadūrato;
anya-e1001n:970_0: Na kacche nopi paṭivāte, na cāpi oṇatuṇṇate;
anya-e1001n:971_0: Ime dose vivajjetvā, ekamantaṃ ṭhitā ahu –
anya-e1001n:978_0: Kassako vāṇijo macco, samaṇo sutasīla vā;
anya-e1001n:984_0: Mahārukkhassa phalino, āmaṃ chindati yo phalaṃ;
anya-e1001n:990_0: Mahārukkhassa phalino, pakkaṃ chindati yo phalaṃ;
anya-e1001n:1000_0: Gavaṃ ce taramānānaṃ, ujuṃ gacchati puṅgavo;
anya-e1001n:1001_0: Sabbā gāvī ujuṃ yanti, nette ujuṃ gate sati.
anya-e1001n:1004_0: So sace dhammaṃ carati, pageva itarā pajā.
anya-e1001n:1005_0: Gavaṃ ce taramānānaṃ, ujuṃ gacchati puṅgavo;
anya-e1001n:1006_0: Sabbā gāvī ujuṃyanti, nette ujuṃ gate sati.
anya-e1001n:1008_0: So sace dhammaṃ carati, pageva itarā pajā;
anya-e1001n:1009_0: Sabbaṃ raṭṭhaṃ sukhaṃ seti, rājā ce hoti dhammiko.
anya-e1001n:1019_0: Avajātaṃ na icchanti, yo hoti kulagandhano.
anya-e1001n:1022_0: Bhato vā no bharissati, kiccaṃ vā no karissati.
anya-e1001n:1025_0: Atha vā pana petānaṃ, dakkhinaṃ anupadassati.
anya-e1001n:1027_0: Bahuputte pitā eko, avassaṃ poseti sadā;
anya-e1001n:1030_0: Puttaṃ vā bhātaraṃ duṭṭhu, anusāseyya no jahe;
anya-e1001n:1031_0: Kinnu chejjaṃ karaṃ pādaṃ, littaṃ asucinā siyā.
anya-e1001n:1049_0: Rujāya jayalakkhaṇaṃ, raso ca bhesajjampi ca;
anya-e1001n:1060_0: Tathā viññūhi viññeyyā, mittadārā ca bandhavā.
anya-e1001n:1063_0: Āsā lokitthiyo nāma, velā tāsaṃ na vijjati;
anya-e1001n:1064_0: Sārattā ca pagabbhā ca, sikhī sabbaghaso yathā;
anya-e1001n:1065_0: Tasmā tāyo hitvāna, brūheyya vivekaṃ sudhī.
anya-e1001n:1066_0: Āsā lokitthiyo nāma, velā tāsaṃ na vijjati;
anya-e1001n:1067_0: Sāratthā ca pagabbhā ca, sikhī sabbaghaso yathā;
anya-e1001n:1070_0: Loke hi aṅganā nāma, kodhanā mittabhedikā;
anya-e1001n:1073_0: Yathā nadī ca pantho ca, pānāgāraṃ sabhā papā;
anya-e1001n:1074_0: Evaṃ lokitthiyo nāma, nāsaṃ kujjhanti paṇḍitā.
anya-e1001n:1076_0: Sabbā nadī vaṅkagatī, sabbe kaṭṭhamayā vanā;
anya-e1001n:1080_0: Tasmā ghatañca aggiñca, nekatra ṭhapaye budho.
anya-e1001n:1082_0: Itthīnañca dhanaṃ rūpaṃ, purisānaṃ vijjā dhanaṃ;
anya-e1001n:1083_0: Bhikkhūnañca dhanaṃ sīlaṃ, rājānañca dhanaṃ balaṃ.
anya-e1001n:1091_0: Dvitipati nārī ceva, vihāradviti bhikkhu ca;
anya-e1001n:1094_0: Ratti vinā na candimā, vīcivinā ca sāgaro;
anya-e1001n:1097_0: Asantuṭṭhā yatī naṭṭhā, santuṭṭhāpi ca patthi vā;
anya-e1001n:1098_0: Salajjā gaṇikā naṭṭhā, nillajjā ca kulitthiyo.
anya-e1001n:1109_0: Itthīpi hi ekacciyā, seyyā posa janādhipa;
anya-e1001n:1118_0: Āsīvisampi āsīde, yena daṭṭho na jīvati;
anya-e1001n:1119_0: Na tveva eko ekāya, mātugāmena sallape.
anya-e1001n:1121_0: Na hi sabbesu ṭhānesu, puriso hoti paṇḍito;
anya-e1001n:1122_0: Itthīpi paṇḍitā hoti, tattha tattha vicakkhaṇā.
anya-e1001n:1124_0: Na hi sabbesu ṭhānesu, puriso hoti paṇḍito;
anya-e1001n:1128_0: Sītakāle bhave uṇhaṃ, uṇhakāle ca sītalaṃ.
anya-e1001n:1139_0: Kappo byākaraṇaṃ joti – satthaṃ sikkhā nirutti ca;
anya-e1001n:1149_0: Dhīro yathātthavādī ca, esa dūto vidhīyate.
anya-e1001n:1152_0: Sūro ca kathino ceva, sūpakāro sa vuccate.
anya-e1001n:1155_0: Appamādī sadā dakkho, patīhāro sa uccate.
anya-e1001n:1157_0: Itthimisse kuto sīlaṃ, maṃsabhakkhe kuto dayā;
anya-e1001n:1158_0: Surāpāne kuto saccaṃ, mahālobhe kuto lajjā;
anya-e1001n:1159_0: Mahātande kuto sippaṃ, mahākodhe kuto dhanaṃ.
anya-e1001n:1171_0: Tasmā hi mātāpitūva, mānaye sakkareyya ca.
anya-e1001n:1173_0: Yathā mātā pitā bhātā, aññevāpi ca ñātakā;
anya-e1001n:1174_0: Gāvo no paramā mittā, yāsu jāyanti osadhā.
anya-e1001n:1176_0: Annadā baladā cetā, vaṇṇadā sukhadā tathā;
anya-e1001n:1177_0: Etamatthavasaṃ ñatvā, nāsu gāvo haniṃsu te.
anya-e1001n:1179_0: Ye ca khādanti gomaṃsaṃ, mātumaṃsaṃva khādare;
anya-e1001n:1180_0: Matesu tesu gijjhānaṃ, dade sote ca vāhaye.
anya-e1001n:1197_0: Garahā ca pasaṃsā ca, aniccā tāvakālikā;
anya-e1001n:1205_0: Dvino dviveka sākamhi, tamhi jātena jātiyā;
anya-e1001n:1220_0: Tiṭṭhataṃ ayaṃ me gantho, susāro yāva sāsanaṃ;
anya-e1001n:1239_0: Pupphanti asanadumā, vāyanti kānane hi ve.
anya-e1001n:1243_0: Yathāpi rammako māso, gimhānaṃ hoti brāhmaṇa;
anya-e1001n:1261_0: Vikhyāto lakkhañño ceva, jeṭṭhena saṃyuto hi ve.
anya-e1001n:1269_0: Āsāḷho nāma māsopi, atīva visiṭṭho bhavi;
anya-e1001n:1270_0: Paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi buddho, tasmiñhi muni sudhī.
anya-e1001n:1282_0: Khe savaṇanakkhattampi, atīva jotayī hi ve.
anya-e1001n:1294_0: Megho thokaṃ thokaṃ himaṃ, vassati patatipi ca.
anya-e1001n:1318_0: Pupphanti tamhi māsamhi, himapāto ahosi ca.
anya-e1001n:1320_0: Vīhayo honti pakkā ca, khettesu mranamābhūtale;
anya-e1001n:1346_0: Dakkhiṇadesato tamhi, vāto pavāyati hi ve;
anya-e1001n:1350_0: Tena sabbampi vipinaṃ, vicittaṃ dassaniyañhi ve.
